jobs.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: We're looking for a Senior Frontend Engineer to build exceptional user experiences with React and Next.js.
responsibilities: Build and maintain scalable React applications
Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs
Mentor junior engineers and conduct code reviews
Optimize application performance and accessibility
Contribute to our design system and component library
requirements: Expert knowledge of React, TypeScript, and Next.js
Strong understanding of CSS, animations, and responsive design
Experience with state management (Redux, Zustand, etc.)
niceToHave: Experience with Three.js or other 3D libraries

jobs.title: Backend Engineer (Node.js)
jobs.description: Join our backend team to build scalable APIs and microservices that power millions of users.
responsibilities: Design and implement RESTful and GraphQL APIs
Build microservices with Node.js and TypeScript
Optimize database queries and system performance
Implement security best practices
Work with DevOps on CI/CD pipelines

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description: We're seeking a talented Product Designer to craft beautiful, intuitive experiences for our products.
responsibilities: Lead end-to-end design for product features
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with engineers and product managers
Contribute to and maintain our design system
requirements: Expert in Figma or similar design tools
Understanding of design systems and component libraries

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Help us build and maintain world-class infrastructure that scales to millions of users.
responsibilities: Design and implement CI/CD pipelines
Manage cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure)
Implement infrastructure as code (Terraform)
Monitor and optimize system performance
Ensure security and compliance standards
requirements: Proficiency in Terraform or similar IaC tools

jobs.title: Mobile Engineer (React Native)
jobs.description: Build delightful mobile experiences for iOS and Android using React Native.
responsibilities: Develop cross-platform mobile applications
Optimize app performance and responsiveness
Implement native modules when needed
Work with designers on smooth animations
Ensure app store compliance and best practices
requirements: Experience with iOS and Android platforms
Familiarity with native code (Swift/Kotlin) is a plus

jobs.title: Technical Writer
jobs.description: Create clear, comprehensive documentation that helps developers succeed with our products.
responsibilities: Write technical documentation and API references
Create tutorials and getting-started guides
Maintain and improve existing documentation
Collaborate with engineering on technical accuracy
Gather feedback and iterate on docs
requirements: Ability to explain complex concepts simply

applicationProcess.title: Our Hiring Process
applicationProcess.description: We've designed a fair, efficient hiring process that respects your time while helping us find the right fit.

steps.title: Apply
steps.description: Submit your application with resume and portfolio/GitHub.

steps.title: Initial Review
steps.description: Our team reviews your application within 3-5 business days.

steps.title: Phone Screen
steps.description: Brief conversation with our recruiter to learn more about you.

steps.title: Technical Interview
steps.description: Technical discussion or coding challenge (take-home or live).

steps.title: Team Interviews
steps.description: Meet with team members to discuss collaboration and culture.

steps.title: Offer
steps.description: We make a decision and extend an offer if it's a great fit!
